required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Intravenous Thrombolysis Registry for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China
clinical_study.official_title: Intravenous ThrombolysisRegistry for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China

lead_sponsor.agency: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: To analyze the real situation of intravenous thrombolysis in acute ischemic stroke in China

detailed_description.textblock: Compare the efficacy and safety of different thrombolytic drugs; Analysis of patients during hospital treatment of adverse events and complications; Analysis of factors that affect the effectiveness of treatment; Evaluate the pharmacological benefits of different thrombolytic drugs

clinical_study.why_stopped: The study has been terminated due to key change of protocol

primary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with mRS = 0-1 points 90 days after thrombolysis

secondary_outcome.description: Symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage conversion rate; Liver and kidney dysfunction; Bleeding gums; Skin mucous membrane bleeding

other_outcome.description: The cost-effectiveness of different thrombolytic drugs

arm_group.description: According to 0.6-0.9mg / kg alteplase (maximum can not exceed 90mg), of which 10% intravenous injection, the remaining 60 minutes intravenous infusion
1.2-1.5 million U dissolved in 100ml sodium chloride injection, 30 minutes intravenously End

intervention.description: According to 0.6-0.9mg / kg alteplase (maximum can not exceed 90mg), of which 10% intravenous injection, the remaining 60 minutes intravenous infusion.
1.2-1.5 million U dissolved in 100ml sodium chloride injection, 30 minutes intravenously.

study_pop.textblock: Thrombolytic patients with acute ischemic stroke within 3 hours of onset

facility.name: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
